pages.text: The Runic Sentient Scythe combines the demonic power of Blood Magic's Sentient Scythe with runic enhancements and Malum soul harvesting. This deadly weapon attacks 30% faster than its predecessor while reaping souls for the spirit altar.
$(will)Demon Will Weapon$()$(br2)Like the Sentient Scythe, this weapon scales with demon will in the chunk. It inherits all demon will effects while adding Malum's spirit harvesting capabilities.

pages.title: Enhanced Speed
pages.text: The runic modifications grant a $(bold)30% faster attack speed$() compared to the base Sentient Scythe. This allows for more rapid strikes and better demon will generation through combat.$(br2)$(italic)The faster attack speed synergizes well with Malum's soul harvesting, allowing you to reap more spirits per encounter.$()

pages.title: Soul Harvesting
pages.text: When $(blood)Malum$() is installed, killing mobs with this scythe will harvest their spirits directly:$(br2)• Spirits drop as if using a Malum scythe$(br)• Works with all spirit types$(br)• No additional soul data required$(br)• Compatible with spirit pouches$(br2)This makes it an excellent tool for both Blood Magic demon will farming and Malum spirit collection.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: The Runic Sentient Scythe is crafted at the $(blood)Alchemy Array$() using:$(br2)• $(item)Sentient Scythe$()$(br)• $(item)Malum Spirit Components$()$(br)• $(blood)Life Essence$()$(br2)See the recipe for exact requirements. The crafting process infuses Malum's spirit magic into the Blood Magic weapon.
